text:
@Kevin_Maguire @DailyMirror The only thing BJ does well is duping people into voting for him. his career is a litany of negligence, carelessnes & half-baked ideas. And that is exactly the government's response to coronavirus.
He not only lied- he actively embraced a policy that would cause Britons to die https://t.co/mt1J20fIAk
